execution_quality: Solid execution with appropriate use of planning mode to clarify requirements before implementation, but session ended before actual implementation was completed, only producing a placeholder configuration file.
work_category: Architecture planning for flexible provider integration in a multimodal AI system, focusing on STT/TTS and AI provider abstraction across offline and cloud-based services.
summary: The agent properly entered planning mode to understand the user's request for flexible provider support (offline whisper/kokoro, Cartesia STT/TTS, Claude/Cerebras AI) and asked clarifying questions about implementation preferences. However, the session ended after creating only a high-level configuration template rather than implementing the actual provider abstraction layer, leaving the core architectural work incomplete. The planning approach was sound, but execution stopped at the planning phase without proceeding to implementation.
follow_up_pattern: User would likely need to either approve the proposed architecture and continue with implementation, or clarify requirements if the proposed approach doesn't match their vision.
